description: Details of materials and finishes for external surfaces pursuant to condition 16 of planning permission ref: 244029VAR dated 18/03/2025 for: Minor Material Amendment (S.73) to vary condition 2 (approved documents) involving increasing the number of homes from 185 to 188 homes alterations to the floor plans including removal of undercroft parking in Block C3 creation of a substation for Phase 3 within Block C2 consolidation of cycle storage larger plant room within Block C1 internal corridor layout amendments to external landscape space additional on-street carparking spaces relocation of bulky waste store in Block C1 and the provision of a communal roof terrace at 9th floor of Block C1 pursuant to planning permission reference: 223090FUL dated 06/09/2024 (as amended by 244022NMA, dated 22/11/2024) for: Redevelopment of the site including the demolition of the existing building and construction of 2 buildings ranging in height from 6 to 14 storeys to provide self-contained residential units (Class C3) together with hard and soft landscaping, car parking, cycle storage and other associated works
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Sherwood Close (Former Dean Gardens Estate)West EalingW13 9YP
